stories.standfirst: She is sentenced to 26 months' jail for stealing over $34k worth of items
stories.headline: Maid who stole from CAG chairman’s home gets over 2 years’ jail
stories.lead: A maid who stole more than $34,000 worth of items while working for Changi Airport Group chairman Liew Mun Leong and his family was yesterday sentenced to two years and two months' jail.

stories.standfirst: Some thought they were going to die as plane descended rapidly and oxygen masks were deployed before landing safely
stories.headline: Scoot apologises for oxygen mask incident on Taipei flight, pilots to be retrained
stories.lead: When oxygen masks were deployed on a Scoot flight as it was preparing to land, the passengers were puzzled.

stories.headline: Police probe Facebook comments on throwing egg at Minister Shanmugam
stories.lead: The police are investigating the comments made by two men on throwing an egg at Law and Home Affairs Minister K. Shanmugam.
